name: Bup-extractor
body: McAfee VirusScan 8.7/8.8 packs and XORs malware to prevent the system from being re-infected and being re-detected by future AV scans. This tool is built using Python and extracts the malware into a folder with the information about the detection.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
